news.title: 俄军自曝：指挥官下令处决拒战士兵
特朗普发表史上最长国情咨文，基调强硬
news.title0: Trump's theatrical State of the Union address offers little hint of any change in course
news.content: 特朗普发表长达107分钟的国情咨文，宣扬政绩并攻击对手，但未提出实质性新政策。
news.content0: Donald Trump delivered a combative State of the Union address on Tuesday night that hailed what he said was an American "turnaround for the ages".
news.author: BBC

news.title: 喜剧演员马丁·肖特之女去世，年仅42岁
news.title0: Martin Short's daughter Katherine dies at 42
news.content: 加拿大喜剧演员马丁·肖特确认其42岁的女儿凯瑟琳去世，死因疑似为自杀。
news.content0: Canadian actor Martin Short has said his daughter Katherine "will be remembered for the light and joy she brought into the world" following her death at the age of 42.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 英国新旅行系统生效，双重国籍者或受阻
news.title0: New travel rules kick in - how are dual nationals affected?
news.content: 英国电子旅行授权系统正式生效，无英国护照的双重国籍者可能被拒绝入境。
news.content0: A new travel system for visitors to the UK comes into force from Wednesday for citizens of dozens of countries like the US and Australia.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 哈里梅根访问约旦，关注难民与儿童医疗
news.title0: Harry and Meghan arrive in Middle East for summit on refugees' needs
news.content: 哈里王子与梅根抵达约旦，进行18个月来首次国际联合访问，关注冲突地区儿童医疗需求。
news.content0: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex have arrived in the Middle East for their first international trip together in 18 months.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 伦敦时装周：品牌拥抱“怪咖”与“极客”
news.title0: At London Fashion Week, brands cater to their unique type of freak and geek
news.content: 伦敦时装周呈现多元化展示形式，设计师更注重与特定社群连接，而非传统走秀。
news.content0: This season at London Fashion Week, designers made it clear that a runway is no longer the only way to go about staging a show. For every high-octane catwalk across the five-day schedule, there were a number of relaxed presentations and informal gatherings as some brands looked to save money, slow things down and connect with their communitybeyond the rigidity of assigned seating.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 五角大楼威胁AI公司：不解除安全限制就封杀
news.title0: Pentagon threatens to make Anthropic a pariah if it refuses to drop AI guardrails
news.content: 美国防部要求Anthropic公司解除其AI模型的安全限制，否则将终止合同并将其列入黑名单。
news.content0: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth gave Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei a Friday deadline to comply with demands to peel back safeguards on its AI model or risk losing a Pentagon contract.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 俄罗斯拟以涉恐罪名封禁Telegram
news.title0: Russia Moves Closer to Banning Telegram App, Saying It Foments Terrorism
news.content: 俄罗斯安全部门正调查Telegram创始人杜罗夫，指控其协助恐怖主义，为全面封禁该应用铺路。
news.content0: Russia is laying the groundwork for terrorism-related charges against Pavel Durov, the billionaire founder of the Telegram app, in the latest indication that the Kremlin plans to ban the go-to means of communication for millions of Russians.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 英国能源监管机构宣布4月大幅下调电费
news.title0: Big drop in energy bills announced for April | Money blog
news.content: 英国能源监管机构Ofgem宣布，从4月起能源账单将大幅下降。
news.content0: Energy bills will fall significantly in April, Ofgem has announced. Find out more and read the upcoming consumer and personal finance news below.
news.author: Sky News

news.title: 英国将迎反常高温，部分地区或达19摄氏度
news.title0: UK to be warmer than Malta and Barcelona as temperatures may hit 19C, say forecasters
news.content: 英国部分地区气温预计将升至19摄氏度，比马耳他和巴塞罗那等度假胜地更温暖。
news.content0: Some parts of the UK are expected to see temperatures reach 19C (66.2F) - making it warmer than popular holiday destinations like Malta and Barcelona.
news.author: Sky News
